title: tfw when clash is placed at an unconventional time

replies.body:
Hey Epixragequit, 

Unfortunately Oceania covers multiple timezones, and we had to balance the start time for Clash.  This meant for some, Clash would be starting as early as 5pm on Friday or as late as 9pm.  Not ideal, but it gave the best chance for everyone in our region to play together.
Just because it's unconventional for you, doesn't mean it's unconventional for the rest.
